evidence.claim: ZOE RCM utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure management.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for handling patient data.
ZOE RCM integrates with EHR systems using FHIR standards.
The use of Kafka indicates a focus on real-time data processing and integration.
ZOE RCM employs dbt for its data transformation processes.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on healthcare data exchange with EDI/X12 integration capabilities.
